title: Make custom animations in minutes with VidToon 2.0
content:
If you want your content to stand out, you need eye-grabbing visuals that you can customize to your message exactly. VidToon 2.0 Animated Video Maker: Lifetime Subscription gives you a huge library of royalty-free pre-animated characters along with drag and drop elements that you can combine to make your own custom animations. During Pre-Black Friday Doorbusters, VidToon 2.0 Animated Video Maker is $34.30 (Reg. $4020). 

Experienced marketers know you can’t just grab some clipart or snatch a stock photo and be done with your visual brand. Vidtoon 2.0 lets you build your own animations without the time animating usually takes. You’ll get a text-to-speech feature, camera zoom options, and a quick interface that will let you make content you can post anywhere. It’s one of the simplest ways to give your brand a new look that will make your content stand out from the noise.

You can get VidToon 2.0 Animated Video Maker: Lifetime Subscription for $34.30 (Reg. $4020) during Pre-Black Friday Doorbusters. 

Prices subject to change.
